name: Winnipeg Transit Map
short_description: As I start to build this system map I would love to get feedback from users of the Winnipeg Transit system to help map the map reflect more closely most people's internal mental map of the areas they are accessing on the transit system.  The goal is not to create a scale map of Winnipeg with the routes mapped to scale, but to create a visualization the reflects user's perception of the landscape.
summary: Creation of a schematic style transit map for the city of Winnipeg
